# Devinuwara Polling Division

|area_total_km2 = 84.95
|population_total = 102925
|population_density_km2 = 1212
|population_as_of = 2012
|population_footnotes =
|subdivision_type = Country

|subdivision_type1 = Province

|subdivision_type2 = Electoral District
|subdivision_name2 = Matara Electoral District
}}
The Devinuwara Polling Division is a Polling Division in the Matara Electoral District, in the Southern Province, Sri Lanka.
Presidential Election Results
Summary
The winner of Devinuwara has matched the final country result 7 out of 8 times. Hence, Devinuwara is a Strong Bellwether for Presidential Elections.

Religion
The Devinuwara Polling Division has a Buddhist majority (96.2%) . In comparison, the Matara Electoral District (which contains the Devinuwara Polling Division) has a Buddhist majority (94.1%)
